works.charge: Founder and CEO of Team Guachi

acomplishments.description: On the first day of 2018 I started with the Guachi project, which is based on the YouTube channel with the same name but expands to many other areas mainly on the internet.

I am currently the professor of the operating systems subject taught in the third period of the software engineering bachelor's degree. I have managed to spend two years as the head of the subject and have all my students pass.

works.charge: Community Manager of Cremeria Tere social newtworks

acomplishments.description: My most recent job is working as the social media administrator of the business called Cremeria Tere as part of the work I do in another advertising company with which I collaborate.
